ygData.msgSnippet: Hail ! My question regards getting the product of a lambent stone and a gem. For example if i want a Lambent star ruby i must give the NPC ( can t recall the
ygData.messageBody:
Hail !

My question regards getting the product of a lambent stone and a gem. For
example if i want a Lambent star ruby i must give the NPC ( can't recall the
name ) 2 star ruby's and a lambent stone. So my question is , do i give the
rubies to him/her stacked ( only taking up 1 trade box ) or seperate ( using
2) ? Or does it even matter ? I just really have zero interest in screwing
this up , any and all opinions are welcome .

Ulaien Firesong
lvl 40 bard of Tunare--
